content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>  <!--\ufffd\ufffd The Office of the High Commisioner for Human Rights-->  <udhr lang="aka" language="Akan (Akuapem)" xmlns="http://www.unhchr.ch/udhr">    <title>AMANSAN MPAEMUKA A \ufffd\ufffdFA ONIPA BIARA KY\ufffd\ufffdFA HO</title>    <preamble>       <title>NHY\ufffd\ufffdNMU</title>       <para>Esiane s\ufffd\ufffd nidi ne biakoy\ufffd\ufffd ne hokwan a adesamma abusua no w\ufffd\ufffd no ne ahofadi, at\ufffd\ufffdntrenee ne asomdwoe a ew\ufffd\ufffd wiase no nhy\ufffd\ufffdase,</para>       <para>Esiane s\ufffd\ufffd obu a wommu ne animtiaa a w\ufffd\ufffdde bu onipa biara Ky\ufffd\ufffdfa no akowie atirim\ufffd\ufffddenne ahorow mu no apusuw wiase no ahonim, ne \ufffd\ufffdhw\ufffd\ufffd a y\ufffd\ufffdhw\ufffd\ufffd kwan s\ufffd\ufffd wiase bi reba a adesamma benya ahofadi w\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdkasa ne gyidi ho, na w\ufffd\ufffdab\ufffd\ufffd dawuru s\ufffd\ufffd osuro ne ohia jo ahofadi ne \ufffd\ufffdmanfo botae,</para>       <para>Esiane s\ufffd\ufffd nea \ufffd\ufffdb\ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd na \ufffd\ufffdmanfo remfa atuatew kwan so s\ufffd\ufffd nea etwa to de atu atirim\ufffd\ufffdden ne nhy\ufffd\ufffdso agu, nti, \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd y\ufffd\ufffdde mmara sodi b\ufffd\ufffd onipa biara ky\ufffd\ufffdfa ho ban,</para>       <para>Esiane s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdho hia s\ufffd\ufffd y\ufffd\ufffdb\ufffd\ufffdma ay\ufffd\ufffdnkofa ab\ufffd\ufffdda aman horow ntam,</para>       <para>Esiane s\ufffd\ufffd nnipa a w\ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd Amanaman Nkabom no Mmara no mu no agye s\ufffd\ufffd wogye onipa biara ky\ufffd\ufffdfa tom, na wogye tom s\ufffd\ufffd onipa desani biara nya ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa, nidi ne \ufffd\ufffdsom a w\ufffd\ufffdsom bo; afei wogye mmarima ne mmea Ky\ufffd\ufffdfa tom, na w\ufffd\ufffdb\ufffd\ufffd mm\ufffd\ufffdden s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdb\ufffd\ufffdma \ufffd\ufffdmanfo atu mp\ufffd\ufffdn w\ufffd\ufffd asetena pa mu w\ufffd\ufffd ahofadi bebree mu,</para>       <para>Esiane s\ufffd\ufffd Kuw Mma ahy\ufffd\ufffd b\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdne Amanaman Nkabom mo b\ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd biako de ama aman nyinaa anya obu ama onipa biara ky\ufffd\ufffdfa ne ahofadi ahorow no</para>       <para>Esiane s\ufffd\ufffd Ky\ufffd\ufffdfa ne ahofadi ahorow ho hia sen biara na ama b\ufffd\ufffdhy\ufffd\ufffd yi aba mu koraa nti,</para>       <para>\ufffd\ufffdnde, Afei,</para>       <para>Kuw K\ufffd\ufffdse No</para>       <para>Pae mu ka</para>       <para>Amansan Mpaemuka a \ufffd\ufffdfa Onipa Biara Ky\ufffd\ufffdfa ho no</para>       <para>S\ufffd\ufffd mm\ufffd\ufffddenb\ufffd\ufffd gyinap\ufffd\ufffdn ma nkur\ufffd\ufffdf\ufffd\ufffd ne aman nyinaa, a y\ufffd\ufffdn botae ne s\ufffd\ufffd nnipa nkor\ufffd\ufffdnkor\ufffd\ufffd ne aman nyinaa b\ufffd\ufffdkae saa Mpaemuka yi bere nyinaa, na w\ufffd\ufffdnam \ufffd\ufffdkyer\ufffd\ufffdkyer\ufffd\ufffd ne nhomasua so akyer\ufffd\ufffd obu ama saa ky\ufffd\ufffdfa ne ahofadi ahorow yi, na w\ufffd\ufffdde nkakrankakra ama nnipa a w\ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdn a w\ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd amann\ufffd\ufffdne ate ase, agye atom, adi so p\ufffd\ufffdp\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdp\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffd nnipa a w\ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd Kuw Mma no ankasa man mu, ne \ufffd\ufffdmanfo a w\ufffd\ufffdtete w\ufffd\ufffdn nsasesin mu.</para>    </preamble>    <article number="1">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 1</title>       <para>W\ufffd\ufffdawo adesamma nyinaa s\ufffd\ufffd nnipa a w\ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd ahofadi. W\ufffd\ufffdn nyinaa w\ufffd\ufffd nidi ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa koro. W\ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd adwene ne ahonim, na \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd wobu w\ufffd\ufffdn ho w\ufffd\ufffdn ho s\ufffd\ufffd anuanom.</para>    </article>    <article number="2">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 2</title>       <para>\ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd obiara nya ky\ufffd\ufffdfa ne ahofadi ahorow a w\ufffd\ufffdaka ho as\ufffd\ufffdm w\ufffd\ufffd Mpaemuka yi mu no a nnipa animhw\ufffd\ufffd anaa nyiyim nni mu, te s\ufffd\ufffd ebia abusua a ofi mu, ahosu, s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdbea anaa \ufffd\ufffdbarima, s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdka kasa bi anaa \ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd kuw bi mu, s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd ahode, s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdwoo no \ufffd\ufffdkwan bi so no mfa ho koraa.</para>       <para>Bio, w\ufffd\ufffdreny\ufffd\ufffd nyiyim biara esiane obi amany\ufffd\ufffd anaa \ufffd\ufffdman anaa asase a obi fi so no nti. \ufffd\ufffdmfa ho hwee s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdman no de ne ho anaas\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdbata \ufffd\ufffdman foforo bi ho, anaa nso enni n; ankasa ho so, anaas\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdman foforo bi na edi w\ufffd\ufffdn so.</para>    </article>    <article number="3">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 3</title>       <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd nkwa, ahofadi ne ne nipaban ho ahobanb\ufffd\ufffd.</para>    </article>    <article number="4">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 4</title>       <para>W\ufffd\ufffdremfa obiara nk\ufffd\ufffd nkoasom anaa nkoay\ufffd\ufffd mu. W\ufffd\ufffdabara nkoasom ne nkoat\ufffd\ufffd ne nea \ufffd\ufffdtete saa nyinaa.</para>    </article>    <article number="5">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 5</title>       <para>\ufffd\ufffdns\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdde aninyanne, atirim\ufffd\ufffdden, ne nea \ufffd\ufffdmfata s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdde y\ufffd\ufffd nnipa anaa ayayade biara twe obiara aso.</para>    </article>    <article number="6">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 6</title>       <para>Mmara mu no, onipa biara w\ufffd\ufffd ho kwan s\ufffd\ufffd wogye no tom s\ufffd\ufffd onipa.</para>    </article>    <article number="7">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 7</title>       <para>Nnipa nyinaa y\ufffd\ufffd p\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffd mmara anim, na \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdnam mmara so b\ufffd\ufffd obiara ho ban a nyiyim biara nni mu. Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd banb\ufffd\ufffd koro no ara a esiw nyiyim a \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffde Mpaemuka kwan no ky\ufffd\ufffdfa no bi.</para>    </article>    <article number="8">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 8</title>       <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd nea ne man as\ufffd\ufffdnnii mmara ahyehy\ufffd\ufffd ato h\ufffd\ufffd a w\ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd de pata nea obi afom no no hokwan anaa ky\ufffd\ufffdfa.</para>    </article>    <article number="9">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 9</title>       <para>W\ufffd\ufffdrenkyere obi, mfa no nto afiase anaa w\ufffd\ufffdrempam no mfi ne man mu \ufffd\ufffdkwa are kwa.</para>    </article>    <article number="10">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 10</title>       <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd as\ufffd\ufffdnnifo a wonni obiara afa a w\ufffd\ufffdny\ufffd\ufffd nyiyim di n'as\ufffd\ufffdm w\ufffd\ufffd peteem s\ufffd\ufffdnea w\ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd onipa biara, de kyer\ufffd\ufffd ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa ne n'as\ufffd\ufffdde ahorow w\ufffd\ufffd mmarato bi a w\ufffd\ufffdde tia no ho.</para>    </article>    <article number="11">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 11</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>As\ufffd\ufffdm a obi di na odi mu f\ufffd\ufffd ma w\ufffd\ufffdtwe n'aso no w\ufffd\ufffdremfa nto onipa biara so gye s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdnam mmara so adi onii no as\ufffd\ufffdm w\ufffd\ufffd n'akyigyinafo anim abu no f\ufffd\ufffd ansa.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>S\ufffd\ufffd obi y\ufffd\ufffd b\ufffd\ufffdne bi na akyiri yi wohu s\ufffd\ufffd anka \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdtwe n'aso, nanso bere a onii yo y\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd saa b\ufffd\ufffdne no, na ne man anaa ne man ne aman foforo bi mm\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd mu ny\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd mmara bi a etia b\ufffd\ufffdne no a, \ufffd\ufffdnde \ufffd\ufffdns\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdtwe \ufffd\ufffddeb\ufffd\ufffdney\ufffd\ufffdfo no aso. Saa ara nso na w\ufffd\ufffdreemfa asotwe a emu y\ufffd\ufffd duru mma b\ufffd\ufffdne bi nsen nea \ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd h\ufffd\ufffd bere a w\ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd saa b\ufffd\ufffdne no.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="12">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 12</title>       <para>W\ufffd\ufffdremfa nea mmara nnim biara so nhiahia obiara ho w\ufffd\ufffd ne kokoams\ufffd\ufffdm, n'abusua, ne fi ne ne mf\ufffd\ufffdfo ntam as\ufffd\ufffdm bi ho. Saa ara na w\ufffd\ufffdrentiatia ne nidi ne n'anuonyam so. Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd banb\ufffd\ufffdde yi ky\ufffd\ufffdfa a mmara taa akyi.</para>    </article>    <article number="13">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 13</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd okyinkyin anaa \ufffd\ufffdtena baabiara w\ufffd\ufffd nea ne man ahye ano k\ufffd\ufffdka.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd ofi \ufffd\ufffdman biara mu, a n'ankasa de ka ho, na \ufffd\ufffdsan k\ufffd\ufffd ne man mu bio.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="14">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 14</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd esiane amany\ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffdm ho \ufffd\ufffdtaa bi nti \ufffd\ufffdk\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdman foforo bi mu k\ufffd\ufffdp\ufffd\ufffd guank\ufffd\ufffdbea.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>Saa Ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan yi yera bere a guank\ufffd\ufffd no nnyina amany\ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffdm mu amanenya anaa Amanaman Nkabom gyinae so.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="15">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 15</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdmanba w\ufffd\ufffd baabiara.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>W\ufffd\ufffdremfa biribi a \ufffd\ufffdnnam mmara so nsiw obiara manbay\ufffd\ufffd ho kwan. S\ufffd\ufffd obi p\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdsakra ne manbay\ufffd\ufffd fi baabiara nso a, w\ufffd\ufffdrensiw no kwan.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="16">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 16</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>S\ufffd\ufffd mmarima anaa mmea bi du w\ufffd\ufffdn mpanyin afe so, na w\ufffd\ufffdn abusua, w\ufffd\ufffdn man anaa w\ufffd\ufffdn as\ufffd\ufffdre mu nhyehy\ufffd\ufffde nsiw w\ufffd\ufffdn mu ni kwan a, \ufffd\ufffdnde w\ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdware kyekye abusua. W\ufffd\ufffdn nyinaa w\ufffd\ufffd aware mu ky\ufffd\ufffdfa p\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdn aware ne w\ufffd\ufffdn awaregu berem.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>Okunu ne \ufffd\ufffdyere nko ara na \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdpene so ka w\ufffd\ufffdn aware bom s\ufffd\ufffd awarefo.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>Okunu ne \ufffd\ufffdyere ne mma abusuab\ufffd\ufffd no ne kuwy\ufffd\ufffd ab\ufffd\ufffdse fekuw biara mu, \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd fekuw anaa \ufffd\ufffdman no b\ufffd\ufffd saa abusuakuw yi ho ban.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="17">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 17</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ho kwan s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdno nko ara p\ufffd\ufffd ahonyade anaas\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdne afofor\ufffd\ufffd p\ufffd\ufffd bi.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>W\ufffd\ufffdremfa nea eenyina mmara so nnye obi ahonyade mfi ne nsam.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="18">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 18</title>       <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd adwenem nsusuwii, ahonim ne nyamesom biara a \ufffd\ufffdp\ufffd\ufffd ho ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa \ufffd\ufffdho kwan. Saa ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan yi ma obi de ne ho s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdb\ufffd\ufffdsakra ne nyamesom anaa ne gyidi, \ufffd\ufffdma obiara de ne ho s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdhwehw\ufffd\ufffd ankorankoro anaa \ufffd\ufffddodow nyamesom, anaa \ufffd\ufffdne afoforo bom som w\ufffd\ufffd peteem anaa kokoam, nam so yi ne nyamesom anaa gyidi adi w\ufffd\ufffd kyer\ufffd\ufffdky\ufffd\ufffdr\ufffd\ufffd, nney\ufffd\ufffde ne \ufffd\ufffdsom mu.</para>    </article>    <article number="19">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 19</title>       <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdka n'adwene ne nsusuwii. Saa ky\ufffd\ufffdfa yi ma obiara kura ne nsusuwii mu a obiara nnye no asabawmu. \ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdhwehw\ufffd\ufffd anaa otie adesuade ne nsusuwii biara, na \ufffd\ufffdno nso nam \ufffd\ufffdkwan biara so ma afoforo te a aman ahye nsiw eyi ho kwan.</para>    </article>    <article number="20">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 20</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdk\ufffd\ufffd asomdwoe nhyiam ase anaa \ufffd\ufffdd\ufffd\ufffdm fekuw biara.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>\ufffd\ufffdns\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdhy\ufffd\ufffd obiara s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdnk\ufffd\ufffdd\ufffd\ufffdm fekuw bi.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="21">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 21</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd onya ky\ufffd\ufffdfa w\ufffd\ufffd ne man mu Aban mu, s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd tee anaa \ufffd\ufffdnam ananmusifo so.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ky\ufffd\ufffdfa koro w\ufffd\ufffd ne man nu \ufffd\ufffdsom adwuma ho.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>\ufffd\ufffdmanfo no p\ufffd\ufffd na \ufffd\ufffdb\ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd Aban no nnyinaso. W\ufffd\ufffdnam abatow a w\ufffd\ufffdnam so paw nnipa a \ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd kokoam \ufffd\ufffddodow adey\ufffd\ufffd a w\ufffd\ufffdahyehy\ufffd\ufffd ne bere ato h\ufffd\ufffd so na \ufffd\ufffdb\ufffd\ufffdda \ufffd\ufffdp\ufffd\ufffd yi adi.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="22">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 22</title>       <para>Onipa biara, s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd fekuw muni yi, w\ufffd\ufffd ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa w\ufffd\ufffd akyigyina a \ufffd\ufffdman no anaa \ufffd\ufffdman no ne aman afoforo abom apere anya no ho s\ufffd\ufffdnea \ufffd\ufffdman no nhyehy\ufffd\ufffde ne sikas\ufffd\ufffdm te. Onipa biara w\ufffd\ufffd sikas\ufffd\ufffdm, \ufffd\ufffdmanbay\ufffd\ufffd ne amammer\ufffd\ufffd ho ky\ufffd\ufffdfa a \ufffd\ufffdho hia ma ne nidi ne ne nipasu.</para>    </article>    <article number="23">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 23</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd adwumay\ufffd\ufffd ho ky\ufffd\ufffdfa, \ufffd\ufffdde ne ho s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdpaw adwuma a \ufffd\ufffdp\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd, \ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd adwumay\ufffd\ufffd mu nhyehy\ufffd\ufffde pa ne emu banb\ufffd\ufffd no ho ky\ufffd\ufffdfa.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd adwumay\ufffd\ufffd ne \ufffd\ufffdso akatua a w\ufffd\ufffdde ma no ho ky\ufffd\ufffdfa a nyiyim biara nni mu.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara a \ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd adwuma no w\ufffd\ufffd ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa a \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd onya w\ufffd\ufffd akatua a \ufffd\ufffdfata a \ufffd\ufffdb\ufffd\ufffdma \ufffd\ufffdne n'abusuafo anya atenaye a \ufffd\ufffdfata onipa nidi ho. S\ufffd\ufffd ehia nso a, \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdde fekuwb\ufffd\ufffd mu akyigyina ka ho.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>\ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd obiara ky\ufffd\ufffdfa s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdhy\ufffd\ufffd adwumay\ufffd\ufffdfo fekuw ase anas\ufffd\ufffd nso \ufffd\ufffdd\ufffd\ufffdm bi, na \ufffd\ufffdnam so b\ufffd\ufffd ne yiyedi ho ban.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="24">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 24</title>       <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdhome ne b\ufffd\ufffdnn\ufffd\ufffddi bere ho ky\ufffd\ufffdfa. Nn\ufffd\ufffdnhwerew a w\ufffd\ufffdahyehy\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdde y\ufffd\ufffd adwuma a \ufffd\ufffdmmoro so ne adwuma mu akwamma bere a wotua odwumayeni no ka nso ka ho.</para>    </article>    <article number="25">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 25</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdne n'abusuafo nya asetena yi mu yiyedi a \ufffd\ufffdma \ufffd\ufffdne n'abusuafo nya aho\ufffd\ufffdden ne asetena pa. Aduan, adurade, afi, ayaresa ne fekuw mu \ufffd\ufffdsom adwuma nso ka ho. Saa ara nso na \ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd obiara ky\ufffd\ufffdfa s\ufffd\ufffd onya akyigyina a w\ufffd\ufffdde ma obi a onni adwuma bi y\ufffd\ufffd anaa \ufffd\ufffdyare anaa odi kuna anaa wab\ufffd\ufffd akora anaa aberewa anaa asetena mu ahyiakwa mma n'ani nwie gye w\ufffd\ufffd asetena mu ho.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>\ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdde \ufffd\ufffdhw\ufffd\ufffd pa hw\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdbaatan ne \ufffd\ufffdba biara. \ufffd\ufffdmfa ho hwee s\ufffd\ufffd mmofra bi y\ufffd\ufffd awarefo mma anaa mpenafo mma. \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdn nyinaa nya w\ufffd\ufffdn ky\ufffd\ufffdfa w\ufffd\ufffd asetena mu banb\ufffd\ufffd ho.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="26">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 26</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ho kwan s\ufffd\ufffd osua ade. Any\ufffd\ufffd yiye koraa no, \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd obiara nya sukuuk\ufffd\ufffd anaa adesua kwa w\ufffd\ufffd ne mmofraase w\ufffd\ufffd nne\ufffd\ufffdma nketenkete bi ho. \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdde \ufffd\ufffdhy\ufffd\ufffd to ho ma obiara nya mmofraase adesua. Mfiridwuma ho adesua ne dwumadi ahorow no sua anaa sukuup\ufffd\ufffdn mu adesua ho de, obiara benya ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa s\ufffd\ufffdnea n'adwene ne ne mm\ufffd\ufffddenb\ufffd\ufffd kyer\ufffd\ufffd.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>\ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd adesua nyinaa botae y\ufffd\ufffd nea \ufffd\ufffdhwehw\ufffd\ufffd nk\ufffd\ufffdso ma onipadua ne obu mu denhy\ufffd\ufffd ma adesamma ky\ufffd\ufffdfa a \ufffd\ufffdfa nnipa ahofadi horow no ho. Eyi b\ufffd\ufffdma ntease, deny\ufffd\ufffd ne ay\ufffd\ufffdnkofa aba aman, mmusua anaa as\ufffd\ufffdre horow nyinaa ntam. \ufffd\ufffdb\ufffd\ufffdhy\ufffd\ufffd Amanaman Nkabom no den ama asomdwoe aba wiase.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>Awofo w\ufffd\ufffd ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan a \ufffd\ufffdso s\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffdb\ufffd\ufffdpaw nhomasua ko a w\ufffd\ufffdp\ufffd\ufffd ama w\ufffd\ufffdn mma.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="27">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 27</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdde ne ho fra kwasafo amammer\ufffd\ufffd mu. \ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa hokwan w\ufffd\ufffd mfaso a efi nyansasua ne ab\ufffd\ufffddemuhwehw\ufffd\ufffd mu ba no mu.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd nnepa a efi ab\ufffd\ufffddemuhwehw\ufffd\ufffd, nhomasua anaa nsaanodwuma adey\ufffd\ufffd bi a \ufffd\ufffdde ne nsusuwii ama aba no mu ky\ufffd\ufffdfa.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="28">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 28</title>       <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ho kwan s\ufffd\ufffd onya fekuw anaa amanaman nhyehy\ufffd\ufffde a ekura ky\ufffd\ufffdfa ne ahofadi horow a w\ufffd\ufffdabob\ufffd\ufffd din w\ufffd\ufffd Mpaemuka yi mu no mu.</para>    </article>    <article number="29">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 29</title>       <orderedlist>          <listitem>             <para>Obiara w\ufffd\ufffd ne kwasafo as\ufffd\ufffdde a \ufffd\ufffdno mu na s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd a, \ufffd\ufffdnam so ma onyin a ne nipadua nyin no wie p\ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>Ansa na obiara benya ne ky\ufffd\ufffdfa ne ahofadi no, gye s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdno nso ay\ufffd\ufffd nea mmara hwehw\ufffd\ufffd w\ufffd\ufffd ne ho s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd ma afoforo ma w\ufffd\ufffdn nso nya w\ufffd\ufffdn ky\ufffd\ufffdfa ne ahofadi. \ufffd\ufffds\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd onii no b\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdbra pa, na \ufffd\ufffdkyer\ufffd\ufffd obu ma guasodey\ufffd\ufffd ne \ufffd\ufffddodow amammu mu yiyedi.</para>          </listitem>          <listitem>             <para>\ufffd\ufffdns\ufffd\ufffd s\ufffd\ufffd saa ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa ho kwan ahorow yi y\ufffd\ufffd nea \ufffd\ufffdne Amanaman Nkabom no atitimp\ufffd\ufffdw ne gyinap\ufffd\ufffdn b\ufffd\ufffd abira.</para>          </listitem>       </orderedlist>    </article>    <article number="30">       <title>Ahy\ufffd\ufffdde 30</title>       <para>\ufffd\ufffdnse s\ufffd\ufffd onipa biara kyer\ufffd\ufffd ns\ufffd\ufffdm a \ufffd\ufffdw\ufffd\ufffd Mpaemuka yi mu no ase s\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffdy\ufffd\ufffd ade bi a \ufffd\ufffdma \ufffd\ufffdman, fekuw anaa onipa bi ky\ufffd\ufffdfa anaa tumi, nam so s\ufffd\ufffde ky\ufffd\ufffdfa ne ahofadi horow a w\ufffd\ufffdabob\ufffd\ufffd din w\ufffd\ufffd nhoma yi mu no.</para>    </article> </udhr>
